/*[Main.xml][selectNotiEtcInf][공지사항 기타 정보 조회][TANINE]*/
SELECT CONCAT('/module/board/boardTypeList.do%bbs_tp_cd=NOTI&tmpl_seq=', T1.TMPL_SEQ , '&modl_seqs=', (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(A.MODL_SEQ ORDER BY A.MODL_SEQ SEPARATOR '.') FROM TBBS_MODL_INF A , (SELECT S1.CD AS MODL_SEQ , S1.REF_1 AS MODL_TP_CD FROM TCMN_CD_DTL S1 WHERE S1.MST_CD = 'MODL_INF_CD' AND S1.REF_1 IN ('NOTI', 'EVT') AND S1.US_YN = 'Y') B WHERE A.MODL_SEQ = B.MODL_SEQ AND A.US_YN = 'Y')) AS URL_INFO , IFNULL((SELECT CASE WHEN CAST(S1.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) > 3 THEN 3 ELSE CAST(S1.REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) END FROM TCMN_CD_DTL S1 WHERE S1.MST_CD = 'NOTI_MAX_CNT' AND S1.US_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1), 2) AS NOTI_MAX_CNT FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT MNU_SEQ , SYS_CD FROM TSYS_ADM_MNU WHERE FRNT_YN = 'Y' AND US_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.MNU_SEQ = T2.MNU_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT CD AS TMPL_TP_CD , CAST(REF_1 AS UNSIGNED) AS MNU_DPH FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'TMPL_TP_CD' AND US_YN = 'Y') T3 ON T1.TMPL_TP_CD = T3.TMPL_TP_CD INNER JOIN (SELECT T1.TMP_SEQ AS TMPL_SEQ , T1.MODL_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF T1 , (SELECT S1.CD AS MODL_SEQ FROM TCMN_CD_DTL S1 WHERE S1.MST_CD = 'MODL_INF_CD' AND S1.US_YN = 'Y' AND S1.REF_1 IN ('NOTI', 'EVT')) T2 WHERE T1.MODL_SEQ = T2.MODL_SEQ AND T1.US_YN = 'Y') T4 ON T1.TMPL_SEQ = T4.TMPL_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.US_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MNU_SEQ != '' AND T1.MNU_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(T1.MNU_SEQ, '') != '' AND (CASE WHEN T1.TMPL_TP_CD = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE (SELECT IFNULL(S1.DSPLY_YN, 'N') FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF S1 WHERE S1.TMPL_SEQ = T1.UP_TMPL_SEQ) END) = 'Y' LIMIT 1
